newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: PT had "good" results in '96 - director.
newsitem.headline: PT had "good" results in '96 - director.

text.p: Portugal Telecom had "good" results in 1996, above its initial forecasts, director Miguel Horta e Costa said.
"PT registered good results in 1996, above its forecasts. It was a good year," Horta e Costa told Reuters.
He gave no figures. PT is expected to announce its 1996 results in mid-March.
Publico newspaper said it had learned that PT posted a 1996 net consolidated profit of 55 billion escudos, up from 36.3 billion in 1995.
PT officials were not immediately available to comment on the report.
PT had forecast last June that 1996 profits would stand at 45.5 billion escudos.
PT shares closed yesterday on Lisbon bourse at an all-time high of 6,100 escudos.
